raw_body:
KULATUNGA – NIMAL – (Retired Director CID). Beloved husband of Kumudini,​ father of Buddhi and Sisira,​ father in-law of Lasangi and Madhu,​ brother of late Ananda,​ late Lali,​ Anoma and Manjula,​ brother-in-law of Indrani,​ late Upali,​ Cryshantha,​ late Janapriya,​ late Dr. Gamini,​ Tissa,​ Padmini,​ Metta,​ late Chintha,​ Prabha,​ late Neeta and Sujith. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s for viewing from 5:30 p.m. on 19th April. Cortege leaves Parlour,​ Borella at 2 p.m. on 20th April for cremation at New Crematorium,​ Kithulwatta Road,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella.
026430
